data.title: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's Relationship: A Complete Timeline
data.meta_description: Here's a complete timeline of Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's relationship, including when they started dating and details of their courthouse ceremony.
data.text:
If you've been on social media lately, you've probably seen Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker’s almost daily Instagram posts. I mean, they’re hard to miss and they’re so hot, I almost burned myself liking one of their pictures the other day. The relationship between the longtime friends turned lovers culminated in a Vegas wedding, courthouse ceremony, and most recently, a lavish seaside ceremony overlooking the Italian Riviera. That's right, they married (for the third time) on May 22, 2022. But, of course, nuptials aren’t where this story ends. We’ve got a complete timeline of Kourtney and Travis’s relationship, so you don’t miss one steamy detail, from how they started dating, to red carpet pics and tales of their engagement.

July 19. 2023: Travis Reveals What He Wants to Name His Son with Kourtney

Travis already has names picked out for his son with Kourtney Kardashian. The rocker appeared on Complex's GOAT Talk with his daughter, Alabama Barker, where they discussed possible baby names. "I like Rocky 13," he said. "That's so bad," his daughter replied. The proud father-to-be agreed that the name is "bad" and that it's been "going through [his] head lately."

In case you were wondering where the inspo for the baby's name came from, Travis explained, "Rocky George played guitar for Suicidal Tendencies. And 13 is just the greatest number of all time." The Blink-182 star also gushed about a classic film that inspired the baby's name as well. "And Rocky, the greatest boxing movie of all time," he said.

July 14, 2023: Kourtney Says She's Protecting Her Energy with Her Husband Amid Family Turmoil

There's no denying that there's major drama going down between Kourtney and her sister Kim. As the turmoil continues to mount, the oldest Kardashian sibling revealed that she's seeking refuge in her hubby Travis. In a preview for the next episode of Hulu's The Kardashian, Kourt said, "With my family, I'm like 'protect my energy.'" The expectant mother added, "And like, 'I'm married! Bye everyone," before ending with, "It's so nice."

July 12, 2023: Travis Celebrates 30th Flight Since His 2008 Plane Crash, Thanks “Amazing Wife” Kourtney

Kourt is there for Travis. ❤️ As the couple prepares for the arrival of their baby boy with some rest and relaxation in Hawaii, Travis took to Threads to celebrate his 30th flight and praise Kourtney for her “healing love” as he overcomes his fear of flying. “Just flew for the 30th time since my plane crash. Wouldn’t be able to tour or enjoy life again the way I do without the healing love of my amazing wife,” the Blink-182 drummer wrote. “I love you @kourtneykardash.”

In 2008, Travis was one of two survivors after a plane carrying himself, his security guard, Charles “Che” Still, his assistant, Chris Baker, and his friend, Adam “DJ Adam” Goldstein, crashed during take-off at a South Carolina airport. Travis refused to fly until August 2021, when he took his first flight in 13 years with his then-girlfriend (now-wife) Kourtney.

On her own Instagram Story, the reality star re-posted Travis’s Threads post, adding, “so proud of my husband.”

June 25, 2023: Kourtney and Travis Host Rock N Roll Themed-Gender Reveal

It's official. Kourtney and Travis revealed they were expecting a baby boy during a rock 'n roll themed-gender reveal that the Poosh founder shared on Instagram. Kourt sat on her hubby's lap as the Blink-182 drummer played a drumroll and kissed his wife. As soon as Travis struck the drum's symbols, blue streamers shot into the air, confirming that their first child together will be a boy.

June 22, 2023: Kourtney Shares an Update on Her Growing Baby Bump

It’s been nearly one week since Kourtney announced that she’s pregnant with her and Travis’s first baby, and tbh, we’re still emotional over the news. 🥲 On Wednesday, the reality star took to Instagram to show off her growing baby bump and, dressed in a mini dress, oversized bomber jacket, and knee-length leather boots, prove that her pregnancy style is perfection.

June 18, 2023: Kourtney Is Pregnant and “Overwhelmed With Gratitude”

ICYMI, Kourtney and Travis are expecting their first child together and we couldn’t be happier for the rock-star couple. ❤️ Kourt made her pregnancy announcement at Travis’s Blink-182 concert in Los Angeles on June 16 (where she held up a sign that read, “Travis I’m pregnant, an epic reference to a Blink-182 music video), and two days later, debuted her growing baby bump on the ’gram.

“Overwhelmed with gratitude and joy for God’s blessing and plan,” she wrote alongside a carousel of photos of her and Trav. BRB, crying.

April 18, 2023: Travis Gives Kourt a $$$ Birthday Gift

Kourtney just rang in her 44th birthday, and in a carousel of pics on Instagram, the reality star shared some of the highlights from her special day — including the verrrry expensive gift from her hubby.

According to E! News, Trav gifted Kourt a drawing by artist Yoshitomo Nara, which was exhibited at the Santa Monica Museum of Art back in 2000. As for the price tag? Luxury auction house Sotheby’s reports that the art piece sold for approximately (wait for it...) $161,819. 🤑 “Feeling so overwhelmed with gratitude for all of the birthday love and wishes,” Kourtney captioned her post. “Turning 44 was a dream.”

April 18, 2023: Travis Calls Kourtney His "Soulmate"

Travis posted the sweetest series of photos for Kourtney's 44th birthday, along with a sincere message about his love for her. The PDA-packed carousel featured photos of the two of them cuddling in bed, making out in public, and staring deeply into each others eyes. Honestly, we'd expect nothing less from them!

"My soulmate. I’m so grateful that today you were born. You deserve everything your heart desires," he wrote. "Nothing makes me happier than seeing you smile. You stole my heart the moment we met. Happy birthday to the most beautiful amazing woman to walk the face of the earth. I love you my wife ❤️".

"I’m crying because you make me so happy. I love you my husband 🥹❤️," Kourtney responded in the comments. Awwwwww.

April 14, 2023: Kourt Praises Trav's Coachella Performance

Kendall Jenner isn't the only KarJenner sister who hit the Coachella festival in support of her SO this year. Kourtney Kardashian took to Instagram gushing about her "first Blink 182 show," sharing the most adorable BTS footage. Along with snaps of shots of the stage and her husband actually performing, Kourt posed for stage-side pics with Trav's son Landon Barker and his gf Dixie D'Amelio.

April 4, 2023: Kourtney and Travis Star in New Wedding Special on Hulu

Nearly one year after Kourtney and Travis tied the knot in their romantic Italian wedding ceremony, the couple is sharing never-before-seen footage from their big day in the new Hulu special 'Til Death Do Us Part. "This is our personal archive footage that we are sharing with the world," Kourtney said as the trailer for the special began.

Set to premiere on Hulu on April 13, 'Til Death follows the couple as they reflect on their big day together. "I had so much anxiety because it's such a vulnerable moment," Kourt added. The newlyweds opened up about the inspiration for their nuptials and about how they felt leading up to their wedding. "I was nervous, and I knew I would not be able to say my vows without crying," the Blink 182 drummer recounted. "Our wedding felt like time didn't exist," Kourt added.

March 20, 2023: Kourt Shares Never-Before-Seen Wedding Photos

As Kourtney and Travis near the one-year anniversary of their lavish Italian wedding, the reality star reminisces on the big day.

In two new Instagram posts, Kourt shared intimate details behind the design process of her nontraditional wedding dress, a white-corseted custom-made mini by Dolce & Gabbana. “The first inspiration for my dress was when Travis and I were watching Guns N’ Roses November Rain video one night before we were even engaged, and we said to each other ‘this has to be our wedding,’” she wrote in the caption.

“She was wearing a short dress and I thought to myself ‘I need a short dress!,’” the Poosh founder continued. “I had more visions inspired by some 1990s campaigns of Monica Bellucci shot by Helmut Newton for Blumarine.”

The Portofino backdrop in Italy’s picturesque Amalfi Coast served as additional inspo, she explained, adding that the inclusion of Trav’s head tattoo on her lace veil gave her “chills.”

In a second post, Kourtney shared never-before-seen details of the inception of her reception look, an all-black version of her wedding dress.

February 13, 2023: Travis Reveals Why He Ditched His Wedding Ring in Latest Instagram Post

Kravis fans set Travis Barker's Instagram comments ablaze when they realized he wasn't wearing his wedding ring in his latest post. The Blink-182 drummer snapped a series of pics and videos with his dog while getting a new tattoo. "Just the two of us," he captioned his post, which led fans to speculate that he and Kourtney may have split up.

Thankfully, Kravis is still going strong. The 47-year-old rockstar had injured his left hand while rehearsing for his upcoming tour, according to a Tweet he posted on February 8. When someone in his Instagram comments section asked, "Wait… where's the ring?" Travis responded, "My ring finger is swollen, dislocated and black and blue. 🤕"

January 21, 2023: Travis Tattooed Kourtney's Eyes on His Thigh

Blink-182 drummer Travis Barker is no stranger to getting inked, and his latest tattoo was inspired by his wife, Kourtney Kardashian. On January 21, 2023, Travis posted an Instagram photo dump captioned "Oh hey there," which included a photo of his new ink of Kourtney's eyes on his thigh.

This isn't the first time Kourtney has served as Travis' muse for his tattoos. In September 2022, she told the Today Show that the rockstar has a few tats dedicated to her — including ones she inked on him herself. When she was asked which one was her fave, she said, "The Kourtney, of course."

"He also has my lips," she said, "I wrote 'I Love You' in cursive language and then I did it. I put it on. I did the gun and did it. And then I practiced and did a 'K' with a heart. So there's a few."

December 10, 2022: Kourtney Shares an IVF Update

Kourtney and Travis began their journey to have a child through in vitro fertilization back in 2021, and the couple hasn't been shy about sharing the nitty-gritty details of their struggles on The Kardashians. "The medication they've been giving me [...] put me into menopause," she revealed. "The medication put me into depression."

Kourtney also explained that the IVF treatments changed her body, with her fluctuating weight sparking pregnancy rumors amidst her and Travis's difficulty with getting pregnant. They ultimately decided to put the fertility treatments on pause because of the physical and mental toll that it took on Kourtney, despite still wanting a child together.

The reality TV star took to Instagram with an update on how she's been feeling as a result of pausing the treatments, writing, "Finally started getting my energy back 10 months after stopping IVF, for anyone else going through it, it gets better!"

“If any of that can help people — seeing Kourtney’s journey through IVF, which is super hard for a woman. You saw her struggle with it and talk about it. That’s real,” Travis shared.

November 14, 2022: Kourtney Celebrates Travis' Birthday

If you weren't convinced that these two were soulmates before, today might be the day that changes. Kourtney took to Instagram to write out the sweetest caption to a series of super intimate photos with her husband, and honestly, we want what they have!

The reality TV star wrote, "I am beyond grateful for the day you were born. Happy birthday to the husband of my dreams, my soulmate @travisbarker 🖤 you have changed my life forever. ❤️" Travis simply responded, "My soulmate, I love you forever ❤️."

October 31, 2022: Kourtney and Travis Don a Creepy Couples Costume

We're sure that Kourt and Travis are familiar with staring deeply into each others eyes, but those eyes are looking especially piercing today! The couple decided to lean into their newlywed status by dressing up as Chucky and Tiffany Valentine from The Bride of Chucky, and the costumes are SO good.

Travis went heavy on the special FX makeup with fake wounds and stitching all down his face, while Kourtney rocked ice green contacts and pencil-thin eyebrows as well as a temporary "Chucky" tattoo on her chest. "You got your wish. You're mine now doll. And if you know what's good for you, you are going to love, honor, and obey," she captioned the Instagram post.

October 17, 2022: Kourt Celebrates One-Year Anniversary of Her and Trav’s Engagement

Three (!) wedding ceremonies later, it’s hard to believe that it’s only been one year since Travis popped the question. But here we are, and to celebrate the sweet occasion, Kourt shared a carousel of snaps on Instagram, highlighting the most magical moments of their seaside engagement. “October 17 ❤️,” the reality star captioned her post. In the photos, she and Trav kiss, embrace, and smile ear-to-ear among a blanket of red roses and white candles. “I will love you forever, today and every day 🖤,” her hubby commented.

October 10, 2022: Kourtney and Travis Get Glammed Up for Landon Barker

Kourtney and Travis never miss an opportunity to get dressed up in matching outfits, and Landon's birthday was no exception. The teen, who is currently dating Charli D'Amelio, rang in his 19th year with friends like the D'Amelio sisters, David Dobrik, Carter Gregory, and — what? Who's that? Oh, just his dad and stepmom in full black-tie attire.

Captioning the photo "Landon said “black tie” 🤵🏻‍♀️🤵🏻‍♂️," Kourtney wore a floor-length gown with glamorous, long, off-the-shoulder sleeves and a diamond choker. Travis opted for a simple all-black suit and sleek black sunglasses. "My wife 🖤🥵," he commented. Hey — you can't say they didn't stick to the dress code!

October 4, 2022: Kourtney Reveals Why She and Travis Still Live in Separate Homes

Kourtney dished why she and hubby Travis Barker still live in separate homes during an interview on the Not Skinny But Not Fat podcast with Amanda Hirsch. "I think we're in the place where we're figuring out how to blend our households and our kids," Kourtney said. "For the most part...we're getting those things in place. We do family dinner every Sunday night with all the kids at his house."

Kourtney shares three children — Mason, Penelope, and Reign — with her ex, Scott Disick, while Travis has three of his own — Landon, Alabama, and his stepdaughter, Atiana De La Hoya — with ex-wife Shanna Moakler. Per E! News, the couple lives a block away from each other in the same neighborhood and Travis goes to Kourtney's house every night. The 43-year-old Poosh founder revealed that they're currently looking for a house in which they can all live together.

"There will be [a joint house]," Kourtney confirmed. "We want our kids to also feel really comfortable and they have both lived in their homes their whole lives, for the most part, and they each have their rooms. And we are a block away."

October 3, 2022: Kravis Supports Charli D'Amelio at Dancing With the Stars

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are rooting for Charli D'Amelio. The newlyweds and Travis' son, Landon Barker, proudly watched as Landon's girlfriend Charli D'Amelio performed a rumba to Billie Eilish's "No Time To Die" during week three of Dancing with the Stars.

Things took a surprising turn when co-host Tyra Banks mispronounced Landon's name. "Charli's friends Kourtney Kardashian Barker and Travis Barker, and Logan Barker are here," the former supermodel said. "I know you guys are very proud right now."

Nonetheless, Charli and her partner Mark Ballas' dance during the James Bond 007-themed episode topped the leaderboard for the third week in a row with a score of 33 points.

September 21, 2022: Travis and Kourtney Spill Their Wellness Secrets

So that's how they do it! Travis Barker talked to PEOPLE about his and Kourtney's approach to healthy living on the heels of the expansion of Barker Wellness. "Our friendship and our relationship was started 10 years ago and I think we were both really into wellness. We were both really into eating healthy, working out, and being great parents," he explained.

Travis and Kourtney stick to a specific routine as a couple — they walk or run three miles a day, they eat (almost) completely vegan, and they drink matcha every morning without fail. "We have matcha in bed every morning, no matter where we're at, we're at a hotel, we're traveling," shared Travis. "I've been vegan for 16 years. [Kourtney's] 99% vegan, which I love. There's no fur. There's no meat. There's no fish. My baby just needs to give up cheese, pretty much, and butter," he said playfully.

September 18, 2022: Kourtney Reacts to "Kravis" Couple Nickname

From KimYe to Bey-Z and Speidi, some of the most infamous celebrity couples have equally iconic ship nicknames. Kourtney Kardashian and her husband Travis Barker made such an impact on social media after the start of their PDA-packed relationship in February 2021 that their union was quickly dubbed Kravis.

The Kardashians star recently opened up about the unofficial nickname. "I love the name Kravis," Kourtney said to E! News. According to Kourt, her hubby is a big fan of the nickname as well. "We refer to each other as Kravis sometimes." While the Blink 182 drummer likes the nickname, he did initially have a question about it. "Travis said to me the other day, 'Is Kylie [Jenner] and Travis' [Scott] name Kravis also," Kourtney shared. According to Kourt, she felt the same way too. "And I'm like, 'No... 'but why wasn't it? 'Cause they were before us." LOL!

September 13, 2022: Travis Walks Down the Runway With Kourtney for Her Boohoo Fashion Show

Upon releasing her new clothing collab with Boohoo, Kourtney celebrated the launch with her own fashion show during New York Fashion Week on September 13. Of course, hubby Travis Barker showed his support as he walked down the runway by her side. She held a stunning bouquet of red roses while wearing a lacy black catsuit. In natural Kravis fashion, the couple also brought on the PDA as they made out in the front row.

September 12, 2022: Travis and Kourtney Sit Front Row at Vogue World Fashion Show

It's Kravis' world and we're just living in it. The couple is keeping their streak of New York Fashion Week appearances going as they pulled up to the star-studded Vogue World fashion show. While Kourtney rocked a sleek all-black number with knee-high boots, Travis opted for a long black trenchcoat with a white button-down muscle tee underneath. They both wore black sunglasses upon arriving.

Once they made their way into the highly-coveted event, Kravis sat in the front row alongside other celebs like Doja Cat, Sabrina Carpenter, Laura Herrier, Dove Cameron, and Ansel Elgort.

September 11, 2022: Travis and Kourtney Attend the Tommy Hilfiger Fashion Show Together

Couples that rock together, stay together! Kourtney and Travis showed 👏 up 👏 for New York Fashion Week to attend Tommy Hilfiger’s Fall/Winter 2022/2023 fashion show. The newlyweds were decked out in the designer's latest collection. Kourtney wore a dark blue catsuit featuring the Tommy Hilfiger x Richard Quinn monogram while Travis donned a massive reversible puffer coat with the same logo and Enfants Riches Déprimés sunglasses. The happy couple shared a smooch while sitting front row before the show began.

At the end of the fashion show, the last model to be sent down the runway stepped down from the catwalk to escort Travis onto an outdoor stage, where he shed his puffer coat and closed the show with an iconic drum set. It may have been a windy, rainy night but we love that both Kourtney and Alabama Barker came out to support Travis.

September 4, 2022: Travis Thanks Kourtney for Supporting Him

On Saturday, September 3, Travis Barker hit the stage with the Foo Fighters during the first of two tribute concerts hosted in honor of the band's late drummer Taylor Hawkins, who died in March at 50. Kourtney took to Instagram showcasing more behind-the-scenes footage alongside her hubby at the concert, and he quickly left a comment showing his appreciation for her. "Thank you for joining me on such a special night," Travis wrote. "I love you my wife," he added.

August 12, 2022: Kourtney Calls Herself a "Tour Wife"

Kourtney posted the cutest series of behind-the-scenes photos of herself and Travis at Machine Gun Kelly's Cleveland concert, right after the Blink-182 drummer went against his doctor's orders to not play the drums with a broken thumb and torn tendons. Ever the supportive wife, one of Kourtney's photos featured her hand-in-broken-hand with her new hubby before he hit the stage.

And it seems like her support is paying off! Travis posted a video of himself banging out a beat on the drums while simultaneously kissing Kourtney who was sitting on his lap. His multi-tasking skills are unmatched. He captioned the video "practice makes perfect 🥁" and MGK left a cheeky comment, saying, "oh so this is why I played so good."

July 26, 2022: Kourtney and Travis Are "Stronger Than Ever" Following His Hospitalization

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are still basking in newlywedded bliss despite Trav's bout with pancreatitis last month. According to Us Weekly, the couple is "stronger than ever, especially after his health scare."

Travis is reportedly "focused on his health and couldn't have anyone better by his side." The source claims that Kourt "cares about him deeply," is "the best support," and she's "always looking out for him." The couple is reportedly "inseparable and have barely spent time apart" since tying the knot in May.

July 3, 2022: Kourtney and Travis Release Statements Following His Recent Hospitalization

Things took a scary turn for newlyweds Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker. The superstar drummer was hospitalized on Tuesday, June 30, after suffering from "severe life-threatening pancreatitis." Kourt and Trav have since taken to social media to share updates on his condition.

Travis shared a lengthy message on his Instagram Story about what caused his hospitalization and the treatment he's still receiving. "I went in for an endoscopy Monday feeling great," he began. "But after dinner, I developed excruciating pain and have been hospitalized ever since. During the endoscopy, I had a very small polyp removed right in a very sensitive area, usually handled by specialists, which unfortunately damaged a critical pancreatic drainage tube. This resulted in severe life-threatening pancreatitis. I am so very, very grateful that with intensive treatment, I am currently much better."

Kourtney opened up on her Instagram Story about the "scary" and "emotional" time she and her new husband have had since he fell ill. "Oh what a scary and emotional week it has been. Our health is everything and sometimes we take for granted how quickly it can change," the Poosh founder explained. "Travis and I went in for a routine endoscopy together and he ended up with severe, life-threatening pancreatitis. I am so grateful to God for healing my husband, for all of your prayers for him and for us, for the overwhelming outpouring of love and support. I am so touched and appreciative. I am so thankful to our specialists, doctors, and nurses at Cedars Sinai for taking such wonderful care of my husband and me during our stay."

She followed up with another Instagram Story post to address paparazzi photos of the couple as Trav was transported to the hospital. "And to the paparazzi who sold pictures of me 'out and about' while my husband was in the hospital fighting for his life...these were photos actually taken weeks ago, (I can't even remember the last time I wore that sweatsuit in the photos)... I didn't forget about you," Kourt wrote. "A new level of low, monetizing off of our nightmare. Really savagely uncool when I actually didn't leave his side... shame on you."

June 19, 2022: Kourt's Kids Pen The Sweetest Father's Day Messages to Travis

On Sunday, Kourtney, Travis, and their children celebrated their first Father's Day as an official blended family. Giving fans a glimpse into their celebration, Trav posted a carousel of images on his Instagram Story, including photos of the cards he received from two of Kourt's children, Penelope and Reign — and omg, they wrote the cutest messages ever.

"Dear Travis, Happy Father's Day," Reign wrote, alongside an image of a couple (presumably Kravis) holding hands, and a red heart drawn in between.

Meanwhile, Penelope listed all the characteristics she loves most about Travis, including "You are so so nice and kind," and "You make my mom happy!" Underneath the message, she drew eight hearts and penned, "Family." 🥺 🥺 🥺

June 16, 2022: Landon Barker Opens Up About Travis Barker and Kourtney Kardashian's "Beautiful" and "Emotional" Wedding

Travis Barker's only son, 18-year-old Landon, opened up to People about his father's wedding ceremony with Kourtney Kardashian in May. "I definitely enjoyed seeing my dad so happy and at peace," Landon said. He dished on the vibe of the wedding adding, "It was all a great time, just seeing everybody so happy. And it was emotional and beautiful at the same time."

The teen also opened up about the process of picking out an outfit for the wedding went. Dolce & Gabbana styled everyone on both Travis and Kourt's side of the family for the Italian ceremony. "I wanted black leather pants with fringe on the side and then I had a jacket in the past [with] these little pearl Dolce & Gabbana charms," he explained. "I told them to put them on the sides with the fringe and when I got to Italy, it was literally waiting there in my room. My vision came to life. It was sick," Landon beamed.

June 14, 2022: Kourtney and Travis Star in Plant-Based Chicken Campaign

Mr. and Mrs. Barker are taking their love affair on the road. The newlyweds recently starred in a new campaign for Daring, a leader in plant-based chicken.

The duo posed with massive buckets of plant chicken and other health-conscious goodies. "I've been on a health and wellness journey for the past 13 years, which has made me super conscious of what I put into my body and my kids' bodies. I’m not fully vegan, but Travis has helped me keep to a mostly plant-based diet, which is so much easier with Daring," Kourt said in a statement.

Travis, who has been vegan for over a decade, opened up about his journey into plant-based food. “I haven't eaten meat since I was 13 years old, so really good plant protein is important to me. Daring is awesome, because it's super clean and has all-natural ingredients." Trav added. "When I went fully vegan 15 years ago, the options were basically straight vegetables, so I'm excited to see more plant-based choices on menus – That's why I invested in Crossroads Kitchen and Monty's and why this partnership with Daring felt so right for Kourt and Me."

May 23, 2022: Kourtney Changes Her Last Name to Barker on Instagram

The Kravis marriage is IG-official!

Looks like we’ll be keeping up with the Barkers from now on. According to her Instagram profile, the mom of three will be going by "Kourtney Kardashian Barker ❤️‍🔥." Her username is still @kourtneykardash (iconic) though, and it hasn't been confirmed whether the reality star has legally changed her name or is just proud to show off her new hubby on social media. Kourtney's reps declined to comment when Page Six reached out.

May 22, 2022: Kravis Weds for the Third Time!

The third time's the charm for Kourtney and Travis. On Sunday, May 22, the couple wed at L'Olivetta, an estate owned by high-fashion duo Domenico Dolce and Stefano Gabbana in Portofino, Italy. Kris walked the bride down the aisle, as other close family and friends — including Kravis's six children, Kourt's sisters, and a couple of her nieces — looked on. The couple exchanged vows on an ornate, red-hued altar, complete with white candles, gold candleholders, and dozens of red roses. "Introducing Mr. And Mrs. Barker," Kourt captioned her Instagram post of the lavish affair.

Kourt wore a custom white corseted Dolce & Gabbana gown and an extravagantly long veil which, according to People, features a nod to Travis's head tattoo that includes the words "family loyalty respect." Following the ceremony, the celebrations continued at Castello Brown, a castle situated above the seaside village of Portofino.

May 15, 2022: Kourt and Travis Are Officially Married!

Take two! On Sunday in Santa Barbara, Kourtney and Travis tied the knot in an intimate courthouse ceremony, and according to TMZ, they had all the legal paperwork signed, sealed, and delivered this time. The outlet reported that the couple was joined only by Kourt's grandmother, Mary Jo "MJ" Campbell, and Travis's father, Randy.

For their nuptials, Kourt wore a white bustier mini dress and white veil, while Trav sported a black tuxedo and maroon platform loafers. Following the ceremony, the two lovebirds drove away in a black convertible, complete with a "Just Married" sign and cans affixed to the bumper. The Daily Mail reported that the lovebirds dined at a restaurant in Montecito with MJ afterward. The outlet published a series of photos from their big day, which you can see here.

According to People, Kourtney and Travis are still planning to have a grand wedding ceremony in Italy but wanted their union to be legally binding beforehand. "They had to legally get married first ahead of their big Italian wedding, which is happening very soon," a source shared with the outlet. "All the details are set and the whole family, including all the kids, are very excited."

By Monday afternoon, Kourtney and Travis shared a carousel of black-and-white photos from the ceremony. "Till death do us part," the lovebirds sweetly captioned their posts. The snaps feature the now-husband and wife cuddled up in their convertible, walking down the courthouse steps, and posing with Trav's father and MJ.

First Vegas, then the courthouse, and next up, Italy? We simply cannot get enough of the Kravis wedding adventures.

May 5, 2022: Kourtney Reacts to Her Children Not Being Invited to Her Proposal

Kourtney's proposal was an extremely happy moment for the Poosh founder, but it was bittersweet. In the latest episode of series on Hulu, the mom of three got a little emotional once she realized her children Mason, Penelope, and Reign Disick were noticeably absent. "I do wish that my kids were here," she said. "I think it would've made them feel more included in the decision and part of the surprise." Kourt added, "I know that my mom made that decision, and it probably wasn't her best."

Before Travis popped the question, Kourt's mom, Kris Jenner, opened up about her decision to exclude the children. "Listen, for us to have to lie to Scott and get them here under false pretenses would've been really hard for all of us," the Kardashian-Jenner matriarch said. "So you know what? This is the right thing to do ... that's the way I feel about it."

Kourtney's daughter Penelope burst into tears and hung up the phone after she learned of the engagement on FaceTime. "I feel bad for P," Kourt said. "Penelope took it hard. I think it's a big change for her and even though she loves Travis, I think she doesn't know what that means. Is that taking me away? I think she doesn't know what it means."

Kourt's 7-year-old son Reign asked what it meant to be engaged and said "How exciting," when his mom explained it to him.

Kourtney's oldest son Mason didn't appear in the episode, so his reaction wasn't filmed.

April 27, 2022: Kris Shares That Travis Asked Kourtney's Late Father for Permission to Marry His Daughter

ICYMI, Trav popped the question to Kourt in October 2021, surrounded by an elaborate display of red roses and white candles on a beach in Montecito, California. But before doing so, Travis made sure he asked both Kris Jenner and Kourtney's late father, Robert Kardashian Sr., for permission to marry their daughter.

In the April 27 episode of The Kardashians, Kris revealed that Travis had recently visited to ask for her blessing. During their conversation, the Blink-182 drummer shared that he went to the grave of Kourtney's father to ask for his blessing as well. Kris recounted the thoughtful gesture to Kim ahead of her Saturday Night Live debut.

"He came over and he asked for her hand in marriage. And I was like, literally — I want to cry now," she said. "It was so sweet and so tender. And then he said he went to your dad's grave and asked your dad. And I just lost it." You guys 🥺. Robert Kardashian Sr., a well-known attorney, passed away on September 30, 2003, two months after he was diagnosed with esophageal cancer.

"It's all happy, happy," Kris continued. "I wish your dad was here to see it, though. I can hardly believe that it's the first time that she's getting married."

April 20, 2022: Kourtney Shared Cute Family Pics From Her Birthday at Disneyland

On April 18, Kourtney and Travis headed to Disneyland to celebrate her 43rd birthday with their Mouseketeers. The Poosh mogul shared sweet photos on Instagram on April 20, where she's pictured with her fiancé and their kids. Alongside the couple are Travis' kids Alabama and Landon (who he shares with Shanna Moakler), Atiana De La Hoya (who Shanna shares with her ex Oscar De La Hoya), and Kourtney's son, Reign (who she shares with Scott Disick).

"Grateful for all of the blessings God has given me on my 43rd year of life 🥰😊❤️‍🔥 heart full," Kourtney captioned the shots.

Per a report by E! News, Kourtney's kids Mason and Penelope were also at the theme park but missed out on the family portrait opp. The group wore stylish sunnies and Mickey ears for the sweet set of photos.

April 18, 2022: Travis Barker Shares the Cutest Message for Kourtney Kardashian's Birthday

Travis Barker took to Instagram in honor of Kourtney Kardashian's 43rd birthday. He posted a black and white picture alongside his new wife and captioned it, "My best friend, my lover, my everything Happy Birthday @kourtneykardash I love you ♾." Awww! I'm not crying. You are.

April 14, 2022: Scott Disick Shares How He *Really* Feels About Kravis

The Kardashians has premiered on Hulu, which means we finally have an inside look at the Kar-Jenner crew as they navigated their biggest headline-making moments over the past year — including the whirlwind romance of Kourtney and Travis. And during the premiere episode, Kourtney's ex, Scott Disick, opened up about how he truly feels.

"Honestly, I think for the first time in probably my life, it's finally starting to change. Now that Kourtney's got her life with Travis, like, as hard as it is, it does give me a place to finally be able to move on," he shared in a conversation with Khloé.

When Khloé asked Scott if he could handle being around Kourtney and Travis (and their PDA), Scott was hesitant but decided that spending time with the fam would be better than being alone. "I'd rather be around them and be around my family than not at all," he said.

"Oh, everyone knows he's still in love with Kourtney," Khloé then shared in a confessional. "It's not a secret, but this is 100% the happiest I've seen Kourtney. I know how much Travis and Kourtney love each other and that has to be hard for anyone to process, especially when everything's so public."

Scott also revealed to Khlo that his "foot was always halfway in the door," hoping that one day he and Kourt would figure things out. But now that she's completely moved on, he's had to adapt. "It was a huge adjustment losing Kourtney romantically, but now it’s becoming a huge adjustment losing her as kind of a best friend," he shared in a confessional. "Now we’re really just more of co-parenters. I would say it’s probably one of the more difficult things in my life."

Although he's struggling to find his place in the family, Scott explained that he will always do what's best for Kourt and their three children, Mason, Penelope, and Reign. "At the end of the day, I understand what the bigger picture is, what would be best for Kourtney and she's happy," he said. "She's in a real thing and I believe that's true 'cause I also felt like I did so much wrong to her over so many years that I felt super guilty. And I always felt that if she ever needed me for any reason whatsoever, I'd be there to make it up to her because of how bad I was for so long."

April 12, 2022: Kourtney Reveals She Made the First Move on Travis

At the premiere for her new Hulu show, The Kardashians, Kourtney dished that she was the one to make the first move in her relationship with Travis. The Poosh founder told The Independent that she was "definitely always attracted to Travis" and that she got impatient for him to kiss her during a movie date night. "He was taking a long time," she said. "I was like, I don't have time for this movie marathon. So, I made the first move."

April 7, 2022: Travis Opens up About What Makes His Relationship With Kourtney Special

Travis recently appeared in a Billboard cover story, where discussed a number of things from his longstanding career to the plane crash that prevented him from flying for over a decade, and his relationship with Kourtney. He opened up about why they work so well as a couple. "We're very similar, with our backs to the wall," he told Billboard. "We have no quit, and I need someone like that in my life."

April 6, 2022: Kourtney Finally Shares Pics of Her and Travis' Vegas Wedding

At long last (OK two days, but it's felt like two years), we finally have pictures of Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's late-night nuptials in a Las Vegas wedding chapel. Kourt shared a carousel of photos on her Instagram account on Wednesday, and they so perfectly capture the essence of Kravis. Dressed in matching leather jackets and dark shades, the two embrace and kiss as an Elvis impersonator officiates their ceremony. Kourt, the truly glowing bride, held a bouquet of red roses. In her caption, the Poosh founder confirmed that she and Travis did *not* have a marriage license, but "practice makes perfect."

"Found these in my camera roll," she wrote. "Once upon a time in a land far, far away (Las Vegas) at 2 am, after an epic night and a little tequila, a queen and her handsome king ventured out to the only open chapel with an Elvis and got married (with no license). Practice makes perfect." You guys 🥺.

April 5, 2022: Kourt and Trav Are Reportedly *Not* Legally Married

So, we have new developments on Kourtney and Travis's whirlwind Vegas wedding. Yesterday, TMZ broke the news that an Elvis impersonator married the two mere hours after the Grammys — but newer reports claim that Kourt and Trav's nuptials were not exactly legal.

While sources told TMZ that the couple presented a marriage license to the chapel owner, insiders told Page Six the opposite. According to the outlet, Kourtney and Travis never obtained a marriage license, and therefore, are not legally married. One source close to the family reportedly revealed, "They had a ceremony, but on paper it's not legal yet."

Page Six also claimed that the clerk's office of Clark County, where Las Vegas is situated, does not have record of a marriage license for Kourtney and Travis. Hmmmmm. We do know that the two have "several" wedding celebrations planned, so maybe this Vegas wedding was just the beginning?

April 4, 2022: Kourtney and Travis Get Married in Vegas!

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are married! According to TMZ, the couple exchanged vows in the middle of the night at a wedding chapel in Las Vegas, just hours after Travis performed at the 64th Annual Grammy Awards. The outlet reported that Kravis arrived at the venue at around 1:30 AM and did not allow any photos to be taken — instead, they brought their own photographer to snapshots of the occasion. Sources also shared that the lovebirds showed their marriage license to the chapel owner, who served as their witness (oh, to be that person), and that an Elvis impersonator officiated the wedding.

Kourtney and Travis originally had plans to wed in the spring or summer of this year, and while they've already been pronounced husband and wife, TMZ was told that "there will be 'several' other celebrations, with lots of fanfare."

April 3, 2022: The Couple Packs on the PDA at the Grammys

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are so in love and they want the world to know. The engaged couple hit the red carpet at the 64th annual Grammy Awards and packed on the PDA, posing for pictures as they shared a sweet kiss.

They kept the same steamy energy inside the awards show. Photos captured Kravis playfully kissing while Kourtney sat on Travis' lap.

March 10, 2022: Kourt and Trav Are Spotted Making Out on a Public Beach

It appears that the honeymoon phase is still going strong for Kravis. On Thursday, March 10, the lovebirds were spotted making out on a public beach, and honestly, are we all that surprised? TMZ ran photos of the couple rolling around and kissing in the sand in Laguna Beach, California, where the two were reportedly staying at the Montage Resort. According to TMZ, the make-out sesh was so steamy that one family went up to them and allegedly asked them to stop. After that, Kourt and Trav cooled off in the ocean water.

February 22, 2022: The Couple Responds to Parodies of Their Upcoming Wedding

February 7, 2022: Kourt Rocks a Vintage Blink-182 Tee

The white, short-sleeved t-shirt depicts the three band members posing in some serious late-'90s fashions. She finished off the casual look with a pair of black sweats, sneakers, and a black sweatshirt in tow. Check out the snaps of their low-key outing here.

October 28, 2021: Kourt Shows Off Her Engagement Ring

Whew. Kourtney Kardashian is coming in hot. The newly-engaged reality star and entrepreneur took to Instagram, uploading a series of red-themed pictures. First up, she slayed in a criss-cross halterneck red latex dress.

She followed up by sharing an adorable shot of two of her children, Reign and Penelope Disick, followed by a luxurious heart-shaped bed of roses with "TK" designed in the middle.

She didn't stop there. Kourt added pics of a restaurant, a pasta meal, red peppers, and her larger-than-life engagement ring.

October 17, 2021: Kravis. Is. Engaged!!

World stop. Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are officially engaged. According to Page Six, Travis popped the question with a blinged-out oval-shaped diamond at the Rosewood Miramar Beach hotel in Montecito, California in front of a massive display of red roses and white candles.

The new wife-to-be shared the big news on Instagram with an adorable pic of her hugging Travis moments after the proposal with the caption, "forever." Travis followed suit simply commenting "FOREVER" underneath her post.

The happy couple celebrated their new engagement with a dinner party with their friends and family in tow.

Kourt's sister Kim Kardashian shared a video of the couple puckering up for the sweetest smooch while they sat at the head of the dinner table via IG Stories. Travis' children Alabama and Landon Barker took their IG Stories sharing b-t-s footage from the dinner as well.

Alabama, Travis' daughter with ex-wife Shanna Moakler, uploaded a pic of Kourt smiling widely as Travis kissed her cheek. Her engagement ring was on full display btw. She captioned her post "So happy for you guys. I love u both!"

She also gave a peek into the event's decor, showcasing the long dining table filled with red roses and an all-white place setting.

Travis joined in on the festivities, sharing a pic of a heart made out of beautiful red rose petals on an all-white bed.

October 16, 2021: Kourt and Trav Step Out in NYC

The couple took their world tour to New York City, where Travis hit the stage during Young Thug's performance on Saturday Night Live. Kourt posted shared a pic holding Travis' drum sticks while they both laughed. Travis commented "You’re the best drummer I know 😍🥁," on the post.

September 20, 2021: Kravis Goes to Knott's Scary Farm

Things are continuing to heat up between Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker, and there doesn't seem to be an end in sight. The happy couple added another installation to their growing gallery of kissy pics while having fall-friendly fun at Knott's Scary Farm. Kourtney posted the makeout sesh on her Instagram Story as they stood in front of spooky Halloween-themed characters.

September 12, 2021: Kravis Makes Their Red Carpet Debut at the MTV Video Music Awards

Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker couldn't keep their hands off of each other as they made their official debut at the 2021 MTV VMAs. They packed on the PDA while hitting the red carpet dressed in all black.

Kourtney later beamed with pride as Megan Foxx introduced Travis and Machine Gun Kelly as their "future baby daddies" before the duo performed "Papercuts."

August 17, 2021: Kourtney Helps Travis Get on His First Flight in 13 Years

Kourtney Kardashian is out here helping Travis Barker get over his biggest fears. She just supported the drummer as he got on a flight for the first time in 13 years, just to go on vacation with her.

In 2008, Travis was in a plane crash, which killed four people and left him with third-degree burns on large portions of his body, according to People. After that, Travis did not fly and opted to take buses when touring around the country, and boats when he had to go abroad. Recently, though, Travis boarded KylieAir, Kylie Jenner's private plane, to head to Cabo for vacation with Kourtney, Kris Jenner, and Corey Gamble.

"It's a huge deal that Travis flew to Cabo," a source told People. "The plane crash many years ago was extremely traumatizing. He has needed a lot of help to get to this point." Luckily, Kourtney has reportedly been "very supportive" of Travis through the process. "She never pushed for him to fly. They have managed to travel in the U.S. without having to fly, and Kourtney has been totally fine with it.

Luckily, it seems like his first flight in 13 years went well. Travis posted a photo kissing Kourtney in front of the jet with the caption, "With you anything is possible 🖤@kourtneykardash," to which Kourtney responded, "Anything and everything with you 🖤."

July 27, 2021: Alabama Luella Barker Refers to Kourt as Her "Stepmom"

Travis Barker's daughter, Alabama, made waves when she referred to Kourtney Kardashian as her "stepmom" in an Instagram live. The 15-year-old was playing "Never Have I Ever" with some friends when she was asked if she's ever met a Kardashian. Alabama quickly put a finger down and said, "that's my stepmom." Check out the moment on the Kravis fan account, @kravisdaily:

This comes as fans continue to try to figure out if Kourt and Travis are, in fact married. That being said, Alabama could be calling Kourtney her stepmom because they are close and calling her "my dad's girlfriend" just doesn't quite feel right.

July 12, 2021: Kravis Marriage Rumors Emerge

Kourtney Kardashian's hairstylist Glen Oropeza had the whole Internet buzzing after he shared a photo of Kourtney and Travis on their recent trip to Vegas with a very interesting caption. "…NOWWW I understand why ppl tie the knot in Vegas 💒🖤" he wrote. "There’s nothing like love AND a good time 🥳"

Of course, this got fans reeling and they quickly flocked to the comments of Glen's post to get more info. "Did you just break major news? Lol," one person asked. "So are they engaged?" asked someone else.

Travis' own daughter, Alabama, fueled the rumors as well when she posted a photo of Kravis on her Instagram Stories with the caption, "So happy for you guys ❤️❤️🥺🥺."

As of now, though, neither Kourtney nor Travis have confirmed any of the rumors.

July 10, 2021: Kourtney and Travis Can't Keep Their Hands Off Each Other in Las Vegas

Kourtney and Travis headed to Las Vegas for a date night where they attended the UFC 264 fight. While there, the pair took the opportunity to get some of their signature PDA on live TV. When the camera was on them, Kourtney and Travis went in for a kiss. Well, sort of. The couple seemed to intimately touch tongues before they pulled away laughing.

Kourtney later shared some more pics from the event, including some of the couple engaging in even more PDA in their hotel. "What happens in Vegas," Kourtney captioned a series of photos featuring her and Travis having some fun in the hotel lobby.

"Happiest Place On Earth 🌍," he captioned the post.

April 18, 2021: Travis Celebrates Kourt's Birthday in the Sweetest Way

October 20, 2015: Travis Reveals He Once Had Eyes for Another Kardashian

While these days Travis seems to only have feelings for Kourtney, her younger sister was actually the one who originally caught the drummer's eye. Back in 2015, Travis told Us Weekly about meeting Kim Kardashian in 2005 when he was dating her boss at the time, Paris Hilton.

"How could you not stare at Kim? Mind you, I enjoyed hanging out with Paris, but I love curvy girls," Travis told Us. "Kim was eye candy. I was in no way disrespectful to Paris, but I couldn’t keep my eyes off Kim!"
